name: QiDao
shortDescription: Borrow miMatic at 0% interest, without selling your Matic
description: QiDao is a decentralized stablecoin protocol. It functions on an over-collateralized debt position model. The protocol launched MAI, which is soft-pegged to the dollar. It has around $150M in TVL, with minting available on Fantom, Polygon, Avalanche, Moonriver, and Harmony. MAI is one of the best assets to bridge with since itâ€™s available on 12 chains through AnySwap (Fantom, Polygon, Avalanche, Moonriver, Harmony, Cronos, xDAI, IoTeX, Solana, Arbitrum, Metis, and BSC).
